title: Nippon-ichi no Otoko no Tamashii
synopsis: Tales of sex and sadomasochism, based on the manga in Young Sunday by Masahiko Kikuni, creator of Kizu darake no Tenshi-tachi (Heartbroken Angels). With a TV share of 9.1% in the graveyard slot, it was broadcast daily as part of the Wonderful anthology program.
staff: [['DIR EN GREY', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yoshiki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Sogo, Masashi', ['Series Composition']], ['Kikuni, Masahiko', ['Original Creator']]]
